AttenuationSettings: If bOverrideSettings is false, the asset to use to determine attenuation properties for sounds generated by this component
AttenuationOverrides: If bOverrideSettings is true, the attenuation properties to use for sounds generated by this component
ConcurrencySet: What sound concurrency to use for sounds generated by this audio component
SoundClass: Sound class this sound belongs to
SourceEffectChain: The source effect chain to use for this sound.
SoundSubmixSends: An array of submix sends. Audio from this sound will send a portion of its audio to these effects.
BusSends: This sound will send its audio output to this list of buses if there are bus instances playing after source effects are processed.
PreEffectBusSends: This sound will send its audio output to this list of buses if there are bus instances playing before source effects are processed.
EnvelopeFollowerAttackTime:
The attack time in milliseconds for the envelope follower. Delegate callbacks can be registered to get the
envelope value of sounds played with this audio component. Only used in audio mixer.
EnvelopeFollowerReleaseTime:
The release time in milliseconds for the envelope follower. Delegate callbacks can be registered to get the
envelope value of sounds played with this audio component. Only used in audio mixer.
bAllowSpatialization: Is this audio component allowed to be spatialized?
bOverrideAttenuation: Should the Attenuation Settings asset be used (false) or should the properties set directly on the component be used for attenuation properties
bEnableBusSends: Whether or not to enable sending this audio's output to buses.
bEnableBaseSubmix: If enabled, sound will route to the Master Submix by default or to the Base Submix if defined. If disabled, sound will route ONLY to the Submix Sends and/or Bus Sends
bEnableSubmixSends: Whether or not to enable Submix Sends other than the Base Submix.
bIsUISound: Whether or not this sound plays when the game is paused in the UI

methods.name: AdjustVolume
FadeIn
FadeOut
GetModulators
IsPlaying
methods.doc: Returns true if this component is currently playing.

methods.name: SetAudioBusSendPostEffect
methods.doc: Sets how much audio the sound should send to the given AudioBus (post effect).

methods.name: SetAudioBusSendPreEffect
methods.doc: Sets how much audio the sound should send to the given AudioBus (pre effect).

methods.name: SetLowPassFilterEnabled
methods.doc: Sets whether or not the low pass filter is enabled on the audio component.

methods.name: SetLowPassFilterFrequency
methods.doc: Sets lowpass filter frequency of the audio component.

methods.name: SetModulationRouting
SetOutputToBusOnly
methods.doc: Sets whether or not the synth component outputs its audio to any source or audio buses.

methods.name: SetSourceBusSendPostEffect
methods.doc: Sets how much audio the sound should send to the given SourceBus (post effect).

methods.name: SetSourceBusSendPreEffect
methods.doc: Sets how much audio the sound should send to the given SourceBus (pre effect).

methods.name: SetSubmixSend
methods.doc: Sets how much audio the sound should send to the given submix.
